name: Magic Clock
description:
You have found a clock which stops the time. All stands still but you can move. So you decide to go to a store and steal some games. Because there are cameras in the store you must use your magic clock when you grab a game to put it in your backpack.

moving is with cursor-keys, with space-bar you stop the time and let it go again.

this game is for the mini-jam #60, where the theme is crime and the limitation was pausing is a core of the game.
